name: Thenasil

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in Dungeons by 70.

skills.name: Spring Lullaby
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Oak-Skinned
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF) buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 25% of this Champion's MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Wither
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Decreases the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
